items.tagline: On a mission to make the web more open and programmable.
items.about:
Apify is a full-stack web scraping and browser automation platform that lets you extract data from websites and automate workflows on the web. 

With Apify, you can turn any website into an API!

How I Use WhatsApp DMs + Website Scraping to Book Calls with Med Spas in Dubai
I‚Äôve been running a direct outreach campaign targeting med spas in Dubai ‚Äî not using ads or cold email, but smart, personalized WhatsApp DMs.
Here‚Äôs the full process ‚Äî now with website scraping for deeper personalization üî•üëá
‚úÖ Step 1: Scrape Med Spas from Google Maps Using Apify
 I start by collecting:
Spa name
Google rating
One standout customer review
Website link
‚úÖ Step 2: Website Scraping for Real Personalization
 I use lightweight scraping tools to pull specific details from their website, such as:
services 
Founder‚Äôs name
Awards or certifications
Blog or latest offer
This gives me extra personalization ammo beyond Google reviews.
‚úÖ Step 3: Customized Message Example
üü£ Business: Sweet Medical Spa and Massage
 üü£ Rating: 38
 üü£ Review:
 "The calming atmosphere melted away my stress... massage was heavenly."
üü£ Website says:
 üí° "Voted Dubai's top choice for full-body stress relief"
üü£ Final Message:
‚Äúhi sweet medical spa üå∏
 just read this: ‚Äòthe calming atmosphere melted away my stress‚Ä¶ massage was heavenly‚Äô ‚Äî and saw you're voted dubai‚Äôs top spot for full-body stress relief. üëè
i‚Äôm sure you‚Äôre treating your clients like royalty, but your Google Maps rating is still at 38 ‚Äî this could be quietly holding you back.
we helped ARMONIA boost their visibility and conversions big time ‚Äî and i believe we can do the same for you.
let‚Äôs jump on a quick 30-min zoom call and see what‚Äôs possible.
see you soon,
 abdou‚Äù
‚úÖ Why This Works
Uses both public review and website-specific info
Feels human, not spammy
Shows respect by doing the homework
Builds trust fast
üìå Pro Tip: If you're doing cold outreach, personalize twice ‚Äî once from Google reviews, once from the website. The results are night and day.
üí¨ Want help writing your first 5 personalized outreach messages using scraping? Let‚Äôs connect.

Use Apify Scraper for AI Crawling as a native module on Make! ü§ñüü£

Extract clean website content in a format optimized for AI models, vector databases, or RAG pipelines.

Here‚Äôs how it works:
‚úîÔ∏è Choose the Standard module for speed and ease of use, or go Advanced for full control or complex scraping tasks
‚úîÔ∏è Get Markdown-formatted results ready for LLMs, LangChain, or vector DBs
‚úîÔ∏è Schedule, automate, and scale content extraction with no code needed

Select a module ‚Üí run it in Make ‚Üí power up your AI workflows.

Copy-pasting contacts into lead lists one by one? üßëüíª

In today‚Äôs competitive world, staying ahead of your competitors is no longer a luxury‚Äîit‚Äôs a necessity.

One of our clients, who owns a successful chain of restaurants, came to us with a challenge:
üëâ ‚ÄúI need a way to monitor my 4 main competitors' social media activity and online reviews, without doing it manually.‚Äù

üéØ Solution? built a powerful automation system ‚Äì the ‚ÄúCompetitor Social Media Analyzer.‚Äù

Here‚Äôs how it works (and it only required 4 tools):

‚úÖ Make ‚Äì The backbone of the automation; connects all systems seamlessly

‚úÖ Apify ‚Äì Scrapes data from Instagram, TikTok, and Google Reviews

‚úÖ CRM ‚Äì Stores and organizes all collected competitor data for easy access

‚úÖ OpenAI ‚Äì Analyzes competitor trends/engagement, compares with our brand‚Äôs data, and auto-generates a detailed email report with:

> What our competitors are doing
> Their daily engagement performance
> Their top-performing content
> How customers are reacting to their updates
> Actionable insights to help us improve

üì¨ The result? Every day, the client‚Äôs team gets a clear, data-driven competitive analysis email‚Äîwith zero manual work.

‚ú® From competitor moves to marketing improvements, all in one place. And yes‚Äîthis tracks engagement daily.

üî• Exclusive Offer
In collaboration with Apify, They're offering an exclusive 20% discount on all Apify plans‚Äîjust for my network.

üîí Limited to the first 50 people only. Don‚Äôt miss it‚ÄîComment ‚ÄúApify‚Äù to claim your discount.üéü 

Follow for more incredible AI automation solutions. ü§ñ

Automated Google Maps Lead Scraper with n8n & Apify.

I built a no-code automation that scrapes business leads (e.g., names, contacts, ratings) from Google Maps using Apify‚Äôs API integration. The workflow runs on n8n, automatically filtering and organizing data into a Google Sheet for easy analysis. Saved a client 10 hours/week on manual research and boosted lead generation by 30%. Perfect for marketing teams or small businesses targeting local customers! DM me to set this or a custom workflow to fit your needs up for you.
Tools Used: 
‚Ä¢ Apify (data scraping)
‚Ä¢ n8n (workflow automation)
‚Ä¢ Google Maps (data source)
‚Ä¢ Google Sheets (data storage).
